{"id":977367795,"question_id":6,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1687462880,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/977367795/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"43.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String convert(String s, int n) {\n        int diff = 2*n-2;\n        int len = s.length();\n        if(len < 3 || n == 1){\n            return s;\n        }\n        StringBuilder res = new StringBuilder();\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            int start = i;\n            while(start<len){\n                res.append(s.charAt(start));\n                start+=diff;\n                if(i!=0 && i!=n-1 && start-2*i<len){\n                    res.append(s.charAt(start-2*i));\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return res.toString();\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
